name: Hyper Void
description: Punch your way through waves of enemies and bosses as you travel through volatile and crazy wormholes, all rendered in high-quality 3D with a heart-pumping progressive soundtrack in 29+ challenging levels!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: x86 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: D3D9-compliant 3D accelerator (Intel, AMD, NVidia) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1100 MB available space
